<!-- Google Analytics Tracking -->
<script type="text/javascript">
	var _gaq = _gaq || [];
	_gaq.push(['_setAccount', 'UA-1623692-1']);
	_gaq.push(['_setAllowAnchor', true]);
	_gaq.push(['_addOrganic', 'google', 'q', true, 'google images', '/imgres?']);
	_gaq.push(['_trackPageview']);
		
	function WaitForSeconds(interval) {
		s = interval * 1000;
		var t = new Date().getTime(); 
		while ((new Date().getTime() - t) < s) { var x = 0 >> 1; }
	}

	var initCount = 0;

	//Common Google Analytics extended tracking
	$(document).ready(function() {

		// if (initCount==0 && 1==2){
		if (initCount==0){
			(function() { 
				var ga = document.createElement('script'); ga.type = 'text/javascript'; ga.async = true;
				ga.src = ('https:' == document.location.protocol ? 'https://ssl' : 'http://www') + '.google-analytics.com/ga.js';
				var s = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0]; s.parentNode.insertBefore(ga, s);
			})();

			initCount++;
			//Outbound link tracking
			$('a[href*="aviva.co"]').click(function() { _gaq.push('_trackEvent', 'Outbound Links', 'Clickthrough', 'Aviva'); WaitForSeconds(0.25); });
			$('a[href*="amazon."]').click(function() { _gaq.push('_trackEvent', 'Outbound Links', 'Clickthrough', 'Amazon'); WaitForSeconds(0.25); });
			$('a[href*="bbcgoodfood.com"]').click(function() { _gaq.push('_trackEvent', 'Outbound Links', 'Clickthrough', 'BBC Good Food'); WaitForSeconds(0.25); });
			$('a[href*="mysupermarket.co.uk"]').click(function() { _gaq.push('_trackEvent', 'Outbound Links', 'Clickthrough', 'MySupermarket'); WaitForSeconds(0.25); });		
			//Track newsletter subscriptions
			$('#newsletter-signup').one('submit', function() { _gaq.push(['_trackEvent', 'Food Newsletter', 'Signup', location.pathname]); WaitForSeconds(0.25); });
			//Track print link clicks
			$('a.print-version').click(function(){ _gaq.push(['_trackEvent', 'Print', 'Print: ' + document.title, location.pathname]); WaitForSeconds(0.25); });
			//Track email link clicks
			$('a[href^="mailto:"]').click(function() { _gaq.push(['_trackEvent', 'E-Mail Links', 'Click', $(this).attr('href').replace('mailto:','')]); WaitForSeconds(0.25); });
			//Track downloads of jpg, jpeg, pdf and mp3 files
			$('a[href]').filter(function() {
				return /(jpe?g|pdf|mp3)$/.test( $(this).attr('href'))
			}).click(function(event) {
				_gaq.push(['_trackEvent', 'Files', 'Download', $(this).attr('href')]);
				WaitForSeconds(0.25);
			});
			//Track any social share links not converted to their plugin buttons
			$('a.track-share-link').click(function() {
				var n = $(this).attr('href').replace(/.*?(twitter|facebook|plus|del\.icio\.us|stumble|digg|reddit|bookmarks).*/gi,'$1');
				if ( n == 'twitter') { _gaq.push(['_trackSocial', 'Twitter', 'Tweet']); }
				if ( n == 'facebook') { _gaq.push(['_trackSocial', 'Facebook', 'Like']); }
				if ( n == 'plus') { _gaq.push(['_trackSocial', 'Google', '+1']); }
				if ( n == 'del.icio.us') { _gaq.push(['_trackSocial', 'Del.icio.us', 'Share']); }
				if ( n == 'stumble') { _gaq.push(['_trackSocial', 'StumbleUpon', 'Share']); }
				if ( n == 'digg') { _gaq.push(['_trackSocial', 'Digg', 'Share']); }
				if ( n == 'reddit') { _gaq.push(['_trackSocial', 'Reddit', 'Share']); }
				if ( n == 'bookmarks') { _gaq.push(['_trackSocial', 'Google Bookmarks', 'Bookmark']); }
			});
			//Track clicks on 'Recently viewed recipes' text or image links
			$('ul#recently-viewed-carousel li a').click(function() {
				var t = $(this).attr('uktv:wt-link-name');
				var l = '(unknown)';
				if(t == 'Text link') { l = $(this).text(); }
				else { l = $(this).children('img').attr('alt'); }
				_gaq.push(['_trackEvent', 'Recently Viewed Recipes', 'View', l]);
			});
			//Account registrations (this doesn't have to be on all pages)
			$('form[action="http://uktv.co.uk/food/registerprocess"]').one('submit', function() { _gaq.push(['_trackEvent', 'Site Registrations', 'Register', 'Good Food Channel']); WaitForSeconds(0.25); });
			//Track competition form submissions
			if(/competition\/aid\/([0-9]+)/.test($(location).attr('pathname'))) {
				$('a.channelBtn > img[alt="Finish"]').click(function() {
					var id = $(location).attr('pathname');
					var re = /aid\/([0-9]+)/gi
					match = re.exec(id);
					if (match != null) { id = match[1]; }
					var name = $(document).attr('title').replace(/(.+?):.*/,'$1');
					_gaq.push(['_trackEvent','Good Food Competitions','Submit Entry', name + ' (ID: ' + id + ')']);
					WaitForSeconds(0.25);
				});
			}
			//Set Custom Variable slot 2 and track an event for users who submit a comment
			$('#comment-form').one('submit', function() {
				_gaq.push(['_setCustomVar', 2, 'Comments', location.pathname, 2]);
				_gaq.push(['_trackEvent', 'Comments', 'Submit', location.pathname]);
				WaitForSeconds(0.25);
			});

			if(typeof FB !== 'undefined'){// this test added to prevent FB undefined error SCP 24/9/2012
				FB.Event.subscribe('edge.create', function(targetUrl) { _gaq.push(['_trackSocial', 'Facebook', 'like', targetUrl]); });
				FB.Event.subscribe('edge.remove', function(targetUrl) { _gaq.push(['_trackSocial', 'Facebook', 'unlike', targetUrl]); });
			}
			
			twttr.events.bind('tweet', function(event){
			  if (event) {
			    var targetUrl;
			    if (event.target && event.target.nodeName == 'IFRAME') {
			      targetUrl = extractParamFromUri(event.target.src, 'url');
			      _gaq.push(['_trackSocial', 'Twitter', 'tweet', targetUrl]);
			    } else {
			      _gaq.push(['_trackSocial', 'Twitter', 'tweet']);
				}
			  }
			});

		}
	});
</script>
<!-- End Google Analytics Tracking -->

<script type="text/javascript">
function addCSS() {
	var linktghref = "";
	if (linktghref!=""){
	    var headtg = document.getElementsByTagName('head')[0];
	    if (!headtg) return;
	    var linktg = document.createElement('link');
	    linktg.type = 'text/css';
	    linktg.rel = 'stylesheet';
	    linktg.href = linktghref;
	    headtg.appendChild(linktg);
	}
} 
</script> 
		<script type="text/javascript">
			adSrc = "http://2a7e9.v.fwmrm.net/ad/g/1?nw=174057&pvrn=211597957881&csid=home/dgiped&resp=ad;_fw_fss=_fw_search&;ptgt=s&envp=g_js&slid=c4advert-PageSkin&w=1024&h=768";
			adScript = '<scr' + 'ipt type="text/javascript" src="'+adSrc+'"></scr' + 'ipt>';
			document.write(adScript);
			var ChannelName = 'home'
		</script>
	
<!-- Begin comScore OnClick v1.1.1 code (c) 2004-2009 Copyright Nedstat B.V. All rights reserved -->
<script type="text/javascript" language="JavaScript">
	//<[CDATA[
	function ns_onclick(i,b,c,h,j)
	{
		var e="";
		if(typeof ns_pixelUrl=="string")
		{
			e=ns_pixelUrl.substring(0,ns_pixelUrl.indexOf("?")+1)}e+=c;
			e+="&ns_type="+h+"&ns_action=view";
			e+="&ns__t="+(new Date()).getTime();
			if(!b)
			{
				b=i.href
			}
			var	d=document.referrer;
			if(d.lastIndexOf("/")==d.length-1)
			{
				d=d.substring(d.lastIndexOf("/"),0)
			}
			if(d.length>0)
			{
				e+="&amp;ns_referrer="+escape(d)
			}
			j=j||"";
			var	f=(i&&i.target&&i.target!="")?(i.target.substring(0,1)=="_")?i.target.substring(1):i.target:"self";
			var g=new Image();
			if(f&&b)
			{
				if(window[f])
				{
					window.ns_softclick_timer=function(k,a)
					{
						return function()
						{
							if(window.ns_softclick_timeout)
							{
								window.clearTimeout(window.ns_softclick_timeout)
							}
							g.onload=g.onerror=function(){return};
							window[((window[k])?k:"self")].location.href=a
						}
					}(f,b);
					ns_softclick_timeout=window.setTimeout("ns_softclick_timer()",5000);
					g.onload=g.onerror=window.ns_softclick_timer
				}
				else
				{
					window.open(b,f,j)
				}
			}
			g.src=e;
			return false;
	};
	// ]]>
</script>
<!-- End comScore OnClick v1.1.1 code -->







<!-- Begin CMC v2.0 -->
<script type="text/javascript">
	// <![CDATA[
	function sitestat(u)
	{
		var d=document,l=d.location;
		ns_pixelUrl=u+"&ns__t="+(new Date().getTime());
		u=ns_pixelUrl+"&ns_c="+((d.characterSet)?d.characterSet:d.defaultCharset)+"&ns_ti="+escape(d.title)+"&ns_jspageurl="+escape(l&&l.href?l.href:d.URL)+"&ns_referrer="+escape(d.referrer);
		var	m=u.lastIndexOf("&");
		if(u.length>2000&&m>=0)
		{
			u=u.substring(0,m+1)+"ns_cut="+u.substring(m+1,u.lastIndexOf("=")).substring(0,40)
		}
		(d.images)?new Image().src=u:d.write('<'+'p><'+'img	src="'+u+'" height="1" width="1" alt="*"/'+'><'+'/p>');
	};
	
		sitestat("//uk.sitestat.com/uktv/home/s?name=lovehome%2Eco%2Euk%3A%20Interior%20design%20ideas%20and%20easy%20how%20to%20guides%20for%20decorating%2C%20DIY%20and%20the%20garden&uktv_campaign=");
	
	// ]]>
</script>

	<noscript><p><img src="//uk.sitestat.com/uktv/home/s?name=lovehome%2Eco%2Euk%3A%20Interior%20design%20ideas%20and%20easy%20how%20to%20guides%20for%20decorating%2C%20DIY%20and%20the%20garden&uktv_campaign=" height="1" width="1" alt="*"/></p></noscript>

<!-- End CMC -->

	<ul class="navigation">

			<li>

			<li>
				<a href="http://uktv.co.uk/home/dgip/kw/3" title="Rooms" class=" ">Rooms</a>
				
					<ul>
						
							<li><a href="http://uktv.co.uk/homes/dgip/kw/13" title="Living room">Living room</a></li>
							
							<li><a href="http://uktv.co.uk/home/dgiped/kw/167" title="Hall">Hall</a></li>
							
							<li class="row-end"><a href="http://uktv.co.uk/homes/dgip/kw/10" title="Kitchen">Kitchen</a></li>
							
							<li><a href="http://uktv.co.uk/home/dgiped/kw/293" title="Loft">Loft</a></li>
							
							<li><a href="http://uktv.co.uk/homes/dgip/kw/11" title="Bedroom">Bedroom</a></li>
							
							<li class="row-end"><a href="http://uktv.co.uk/homes/dgip/kw/14" title="Dining room">Dining room</a></li>

		<span id="VPNT_1" class="_fwph">
			<form id="_fw_form_VPNT_1" style="display:none">

<div class="video-info box-container" id="home-video-info">
	<h2>Video</h2>

	<dl class="clearfix">

	
		<dt class="one active"><a href="http://uktv.co.uk/home/video/aid/659172">
			
				<img src="http://uktv.co.uk/images/standarditem/s/video_70x70PlaceHolder.gif" alt="Video: Build daylight into your project" width="70" height="70" />
			
			</a></dt>
		<dd class="one active">
			<em>Video</em>
			<a href="http://uktv.co.uk/home/video/aid/659172">Video: Build daylight into your project</a>
		</dd>

			</a></dt>

	<div class="channel-footer clearfix">
		<h2>ABOUT THE HOME CHANNEL</h2>
		<ul>
			
					<li class="last"><p style='color: #333333;'>Home is a UK TV channel, available on Sky 196 and Virgin 265, featuring the best interior design, home decorating, DIY and gardening programmes. Our website, lovehome.co.uk, has articles, videos and photo galleries to inspire and help you in your home improvement projects, from kitchens to bathrooms, bedrooms to landscaping.</p><br />

<p style='color:#333333;'>Our team of experts, including Ty Pennington, Paul Martin, Nick Knowles and Craig Phillips, offer practical advice and inspiration in Home's TV shows - from DIY SOS, Homes Under The Hammer and Ground Force to Escape To The Country and Extreme Makeover Home Edition. Find advice or simply draw inspiration by browsing our galleries. Home, there's no place like it!</p></li>
				
		</ul>
	</div>

<script type="text/javascript">//<![CDATA[
	var clickTotal = 0;

	
	$("a[uktv\\:wt-link-group]").click(function(e){				
		ns_onclick(this,'',$(this).attr('uktv:wt-link-name')+'&uktv_linkpos='+$(this).attr('uktv:wt-link-group'),'clickout');
		_gaq.push(['_trackEvent', 'Outbound Links', $(this).attr('uktv:wt-link-group'), $(this).attr('uktv:wt-link-name')]);
	});
	
	
		var adImpressionCounter = 0;
		$('.callReload').click(function(e) {
			e.preventDefault(); 
			adsReload(); // added back in SCP 4/7/2012 as food wasn't refreshing.   removed 15/10/12 causing probs.
			// tracking
			uktv.tracker.trackGPageView();
			sitestat('http://uk.sitestat.com/uktv/home/s?name=lovehome%2Eco%2Euk%3A%20Interior%20design%20ideas%20and%20easy%20how%20to%20guides%20for%20decorating%2C%20DIY%20and%20the%20garden&amp;ns_type=view&uktv_loggedin=false');
			//ns_onclick(this,'',$(this).attr('uktv:wt-link-name')+'&uktv_linkpos='+$(this).attr('uktv:wt-link-group'),'clickout');
		});
	
	// ]]> 
			
	function gpluscall(jsonParam){
		ns_onclick(this,'','Google Plus button click:' + jsonParam.state +'&uktv_linkpos=Social Sharing Links','clickout');
	}
	
	
	

</script>

				appId: '172431169478101', 
				status: true, 
				cookie: true,
				xfbml: true,
				channelUrl: 'http://uktv.co.uk/channel.html'

	$(document).ready(function(){	
		var po = document.createElement('script'); po.type = 'text/javascript'; po.async = true;
		po.src = 'https://apis.google.com/js/plusone.js';
		var s = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0]; s.parentNode.insertBefore(po, s);
	});
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
	//This will create an async <script> to load the FreeWheel LinkTag2 js.
   	(function() {
   		var profilePath = "uktv_display";
	   		window._fw_linktag_params = {
	   		scan_delay : 0,
	   		server : "2a7e9.v.fwmrm.net",
	   		
	   			network_id : "174057", // Live
	   		
	   		profile : "g_js",
	   		other_global_params : "csid=home/dgiped",
	   		key_values :  "uktvid="
    	};

	    var e = function(){
		    if(document.addEventListener) document.removeEventListener('DOMContentLoaded',e,false);
		    else window.detachEvent('onload',e);
		    window._fw_page_ready = true;
	    };
	    if(document.addEventListener) document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded',e,false);
	    else if(window.attachEvent) window.attachEvent('onload',e);
	
	    var lt = document.createElement('script');
	    lt.type = 'text/javascript';
	    lt.async = true;
	
	    lt.src = "http://adm.fwmrm.net/p/"+ profilePath +"/LinkTag2.js";
	    var s = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0]; s.parentNode.insertBefore(lt, s); 
    })();
</script>	



<script type="text/javascript">
	function fw_config(){
		return{
				
	    			network_id : "174057", // Live
	    			siteSectionNetworkId:174057,
					videoAssetNetworkId:174057,
					fw_server:"http://2a7e7.v.fwmrm.net/ad/p/1",
					siteSection:"home/dgiped",
					autoplay:false,
					amLocation:"http://adm.fwmrm.net/p/uktv_short_live/AdManager.swf"
					,fw_keyvalues: "uktvid=" 
			};
	}
	 
	function adsReload(){
		$('img#_fw_cb_VPNT_1').remove();
		$('img#_fw_cb_VPNT_2').remove();
		$('img#_fw_cb_VPNT_3').remove();
		
		var lt = document.createElement('script');
	    lt.type = 'text/javascript';
	    lt.async = true;
	
	    lt.src = "http://adm.fwmrm.net/p/uktv_display/LinkTag2.js";
	    var s = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0]; s.parentNode.insertBefore(lt, s);
		
		window._fw_page_ready = true;
	}
</script>
<script type='text/javascript'>
function crtg_getCookie(a){var b,c,d,e=document.cookie.split(";");for(b=0;b<e.length;b++){c=e[b].substr(0,e[b].indexOf("="));d=e[b].substr(e[b].indexOf("=")+1);c=c.replace(/^\s+|\s+$/g,"");if(c==a){return unescape(d)}}return""}var crtg_nid="1065";var crtg_cookiename="cto2_channel4";var crtg_content=crtg_getCookie(crtg_cookiename);var crtg_rnd=Math.floor(Math.random()*99999999999);var crtg_url="http://rtax.criteo.com/delivery/rta/rta.js?netid="+escape(crtg_nid);crtg_url+="&cookieName="+escape(crtg_cookiename);crtg_url+="&rnd="+crtg_rnd;crtg_url+="&varName=crtg_content";var crtg_script=document.createElement("script");crtg_script.type="text/javascript";crtg_script.src=crtg_url;crtg_script.async=true;if(document.getElementsByTagName("head").length>0)document.getElementsByTagName("head")[0].appendChild(crtg_script);else if(document.getElementsByTagName("body").length>0)document.getElementsByTagName("body")[0].appendChild(crtg_script);
</script>


	
</body>
</html>
